name: Renegade

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally RESIST in all battles by 40

skills.name: Lingering Pain
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK] [SPD]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.name: Lash Out
skills.raw_description:
Attacks at random 3 times. Has a 50% chance of placing a 15% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns. Places a 25% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns if the target has any active buffs.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.name: Sacrificial Ritual
skills.raw_description:
Decreases the cooldown of all ally skills by 2 turns. This skill does not affect this Champion, or other Champions with this skill. This Champion will receive damage equal to 30% of their MAX HP. This will happen even if it kills this Champion.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1

faction.name: Knight Revenant
faction.default_description: Knight Revenant is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 32 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Knight Revenant is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 22 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Disciples of the K'leth death cult, the Knights Revenant see themselves as vessels of the spirits of the dead of their order. They raid indiscriminately to capture slaves to support themselves and as ritual sacrifices. Upon initiation, devotees surrender their bodies to the spirits of dark warriors.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Renegade is a rare assist champion from the faction Knight Revenant doing void damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Knight Revenant, Renegade is a champion of Rare rarity and of Assist type
structured_data.name: Renegade

default_description: Renegade is a rare assist champion from the faction Knight Revenant doing void damage
